function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Obtain prior consent, conceal individual identities","category":"Data privacy and consent","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement strict data privacy measures, obtain consent for surveillance, and have stringent regulations in place","category":"Data privacy and consent","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Continuous testing and validation of the deep learning models, human oversight and intervention, regular updates and maintenance of the system","category":"Continuous model testing and validation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Comparative evaluation of multiple detection models, considering the unique strengths and weaknesses of each model, and incorporating ensemble techniques if necessary","category":"Model evaluation and comparison","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use smoothing techniques to manage noise in the precision / recall curve before calculating area under the curve auc .","category":"Data preprocessing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Be aware of computation method changes and standardize evaluation process according to the latest guidelines.","category":"Computation method awareness and standardization","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perform thorough comparative analysis and consider using ensemble methods to combine predictions from multiple models for improved accuracy.","category":"Model evaluation and comparison","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use touchless or voice-activated input methods for selecting roi, or regularly sanitize the mouse and surrounding area.","category":"Hygiene and sanitation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Minimize in-person data collection by using pre-labeled datasets or remote sensing techniques for model training.","category":"Data collection optimization","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Utilize dedicated or private gpu resources for computation, or ensure stringent cleaning and sanitization protocols for shared gpu resources.","category":"Resource utilization and sanitization","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular calibration and validation of object detection models","category":"Continuous model calibration and validation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting thorough market research and stakeholder consultations to determine ideal projects","category":"Stakeholder consultations and market research","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing economic recovery strategies, infrastructure projects, and employment support","category":"Economic recovery strategies","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic stimulus packages, targeted support for affected sectors, and recovery plans for businesses and individuals","category":"Economic stimulus and recovery support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement data validation checks, regular data integrity audits, and verification processes to ensure the accuracy and completeness of collected data.","category":"Data validation and integrity","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing blockchain technology and telemedicine to ensure accurate and trustworthy data collection and monitoring.","category":"Technology implementation for data accuracy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing robust security protocols, encryption methods, and access controls to protect blockchain data from unauthorized manipulation.","category":"Security protocols for blockchain data","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Encouraging critical reflections and discussions among planners and local authorities","category":"Critical reflection and discussion","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Active engagement and support from planners, local authorities, and communities","category":"Community engagement and support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Require transparent disclosure of financial interests and personal relationships","category":"Transparency and disclosure requirements","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting further research, integrating existing data, and seeking consensus among experts","category":"Research integration and consensus seeking","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting regular reviews, updating research findings, and analyzing temporal evolution of evidence","category":"Research review and analysis","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promoting alternative modes of transportation such as cycling, walking, and carpooling, and investing in public transportation infrastructure.","category":"Promotion of alternative transportation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enhanced data collection and analysis, research funding for underrepresented themes","category":"Enhanced data collection and analysis","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Context-specific research and analysis, flexible and adaptable response strategies","category":"Context-specific research and response strategies","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct research studies to gather empirical evidence on the relationship between urban design and disease spread","category":"Empirical research on urban design and disease spread","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perform comprehensive analysis to understand the impacts of compact urban development on disease spread","category":"Analysis of urban development impacts","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improved sanitation, social distancing measures, and access to public health infrastructure","category":"Public health infrastructure improvements","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improving access to public health resources and education on wildlife interactions","category":"Improving access to public health resources","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct further research to understand the relationship between population density and covid-19 transmission rates","category":"Research on population density and transmission rates","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement strict public health measures and resource sharing to reduce social interactions in high-density areas","category":"Public health measures in high-density areas","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adapt public health measures based on the phase of the epidemic and population density","category":"Adaptive public health measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct further research, consider multiple factors influencing pandemic dynamics","category":"Research on pandemic dynamics","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collaborative research, interdisciplinary studies, and continuous monitoring","category":"Collaborative research and continuous monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integrate multiple factors, consider local context and public health measures","category":"Integration of factors and context consideration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enforcement of strict smart mobility restrictions and travel bans from high-risk cities; implementation of effective monitoring and control measures on transportation.","category":"Enforcement of mobility restrictions and travel bans","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improving the safety and hygiene of public transport systems, implementing effective communication strategies to rebuild trust in public transport, and promoting alternative active transport modes.","category":"Public transport safety and alternative modes","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased investment in cycling and pedestrian infrastructure, implementation of safe and convenient active transport routes, and promotion of active transport as a viable alternative.","category":"Investment in active transport infrastructure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promotion of safe and hygienic public transportation practices, investment in non-motorized transportation systems, and implementation of measures to reduce overcrowding","category":"Promotion of safe public transport practices","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Development of sustainable suburban transportation systems, promotion of carpooling, and implementation of congestion pricing policies","category":"Sustainable suburban transportation development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promotion of active travel, provision of safe and accessible walking and cycling infrastructure, and implementation of community-based wellness programs","category":"Promotion of active travel and wellness programs","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing travel restrictions and quarantine measures, increasing awareness and timely action.","category":"Travel restrictions and quarantine measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reducing frequency of flights and rail services, implementing strict hygiene and safety measures for travelers.","category":"Reduction of travel frequency and safety measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promoting alternative transport modes, improving sanitation and ventilation in subway systems.","category":"Promotion of alternative transport modes","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of extensive surveillance systems, effective communication with citizens, and assurance of data protection and privacy","category":"Surveillance system implementation and data protection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transparent communication, assurance of data protection, and clear demonstration of communal benefits","category":"Transparent communication and communal benefits","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Investment in accessible smart technology, infrastructure development, and digital literacy programs","category":"Investment in smart technology and infrastructure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transparent data usage policies, strict privacy regulations, public awareness and education","category":"Transparent data usage and privacy regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ethical guidelines, independent oversight, accountability and transparency in technology usage","category":"Ethical guidelines and technology oversight","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promote a balanced approach that combines technological solutions with traditional public health measures","category":"Balanced approach in health measures","confidence":"High"}]}
